name: eth-block-tracker
description: A block tracker for the Ethereum blockchain. Keeps track of the latest block.

scripts.bundle: babel src -d dist/es5/ && npm run bundle-polling && npm run bundle-base
scripts.bundle-polling: browserify -s PollingBlockTracker -e src/polling.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] > dist/PollingBlockTracker.js
scripts.bundle-base: browserify -s BaseBlockTracker -e src/base.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] > dist/BaseBlockTracker.js

author: kumavis
